Detailed Description

You can customize another ActionBar by the ActionBarWidget.

From your page, you can retrieve an instance of ActionBarWidget by calling ActionBar.createActionBarWidget().

The following example demonstrates how to use the ActionBarWidget

 ActionBar* mpActionBar = getActionBar();
 ActionBarWidget* mpActionBarWidget = mpActionBar->createActionBarWidget();

 Button* mpButton = new mpButton(this);
 mpActionBarWidget->setCustomWidget(mpButton);
 mpActionBarWidget->setDisplayOptions(ActionBar::DISPLAY_SHOW_HOME_AS_UP
                               | ActionBar::DISPLAY_SHOW_CUSTOM);
 mpActionBar->showActionBarWidget(mpActionBarWidget, ActionBar::ANIMATION_DOWN_UP);
